sample

类 GameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.GameManager

  • public class GameManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class GameManager enables the interactions among all elements in pacman.

    Privided by AnimationTimer, Group, ImageView, KeyCode, KeyEvent, Color, Rectangle, Font, BufferedReader, BufferedWriter, FileReader, FileWriter, IOException, SimpleDateFormat, ArrayList, Arrays, Date, HashSet, Set, factory.Maze, factory.MazeFactory.

    This class implements basic functions for the game to run. In-game page could be drawn in this class. Page update per frame could be achieved. start game, end game, restart game is implemented

    版本:
    1.0.3
    作者:
    Goongiin Lee, Yu Heng, Chen Liao

    • 构造器详细资料

      • GameManager

        GameManager(javafx.scene.Group root)
        Constructor for Class GameManager. Initialize the game manager.
        参数:
        root - the base javafx group for in-game page

    • 方法详细资料

      • fetchSetUp

        public void fetchSetUp(SetUp setup)
        Method fetchSetUp get settings for the game
        参数:
        setup - instance of class SetUp, containing customization variables. customizations for: pacman icon ghost icon color of obstacles color of the background game difficulty map

      • lifeLost

        public void lifeLost()
        Method lifeLost set one life less. Minus 10 marks Reset the position of pacman

      • endGame

        public void endGame()
        Method endGame ends the game Clear pacman and ghosts generate the result of this round and add it to the high score list

      • restartGame

        public void restartGame(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
        Method restartGame restarts the game.
        参数:
        event - binded as an KeyEvent with the key "ESC" reinitialize game data and game board. draw the in-game page again.

      • drawBoard

        public void drawBoard()
        Method drawBoard draws the board of the game with the cookies and the Pacman. The obstacle layout is based on the map fetched from the map factory MazeFactory. The layout of cookies is based on the skip matrix in each maze sample.Maze00.skip. This class also draws: pacman ghosts current score board background board

      • generateGhosts

        public void generateGhosts()
        Method generateGhosts generates the ghosts for the pacman. Each ghost starts as an individual thread Runnable. the instances of ghosts are managed as a set.

      • checkGhostCoalition

        public void checkGhostCoalition()
        Method checkGhostCoalition checks if pacman is touching a ghost. If the boundary of pacman has any overlap with the boundary of any ghosts, a coalition is qualified. pacman will lose one life in this round sample.GameManager.lifes.

      • checkDoorCoalition

        public void checkDoorCoalition()
        Method checkDoorCoalition check if pacman is passing through magic doors. If the pacman is in the area of either magic door, it would be immediately send to the opposite one.
